body.name: LAMPS: Communication Strategies for Global Leaders (From Accent to Excellence Book 102018)

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Communication Strategy Guideline for non-native English speakers
reviews.reviewText: LAMPS: easy to remember acronym that gives non-native English speakers practical tips and guidelines on how to improve their English. The book is easy to read and the suggestions are practical. I especially like the summary page for each chapter - it reminds the reader what you just learned and put that into practice. Good book for non-native English speakers who want to improve their English and become leaders!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Invaluable Resource for Executives!
reviews.reviewText: Although I am a native English speaker, I found the practical strategies shared in this book extremely valuable. The author has a gift for simplifying concepts and empowering readers to become better communicators. I highly recommend this book to anyone who is looking to clearly and confidently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Authentic, Relatable, Readily Applicable & Realistic -
reviews.reviewText: Enjoyed the specifics with relatable insights and stories. The organization was excellent. And easy read allowing for time to take notes and practice. An excellent starting point for ESL readers.There remains some semantic phrasing issues within the book that requires some more editing.Lia is authentic storytelling expert who understands and relates to her audience well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoyed reading this book. It offers practical tips on English speaking and presentation skills. The author is enthusiastic and humorous. Strongly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It will help you a lot
reviews.reviewText: The book was amazing it helped me a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must book for a speaker, leader, BD, Marketing especially whose English is secondary language
reviews.reviewText: I received a request to review a book. It took me 3-4 months and needed a long drive to listen. I started with the obligation to listen and provide feedback. I didn't expect it will be valuable to me. But it was extremely valuable. For me, if any book, speak or video gives you a tool that can change your behavior, habit and make you better that is valuable. Lia's book has some simple easy to use tools and I have started using it - such as watching English movies, listening to English songs which I was not doing lately or watching rarely.Also reading a book with son at bedtime - I used to do earlier but now I do with the intention to learn/improve my pronunciation.So yes, Must book for a speaker, leader, BD, Marketing especially someone whose English is a secondary language. Thank you, Lia !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2020
reviews.reviewText: as a non-native English speaker, I find this book very helpful. Not only you can learn a lot of methods to improve English skills but also being encouraged by Lia`s enthusiasm on English. This is a highly recommended book!
